steps.name: The Weather Forecast application is launched

elements.name: Verifying the application title and header

steps.name: I verify that page title is "5 Weather Forecast"
I verify the header "Five Day Weather Forecast for" is displayed
The Weather Forecast application is launched

elements.name: Verifying 5 Day weather forecast data using different city names

steps.name: I enter the city name as "aberdeen" and press enter
I verify that five day weather forecast is displayed
I click on day "1"
The three hourly forecast is "Displayed" for day "1"
I verify the day "1" summary weather condition is same as the first three hour data
I verify the day "1" summary wind speed and direction is same as the first three hour data
I verify the day "1" maximum and minimum temperature summary is displayed correctly
I verify the day "1" rainfall summary is the aggregate three hour data
I click on day "1"
The three hourly forecast is "Not Displayed" for day "1"
I click on day "2"
The three hourly forecast is "Displayed" for day "2"
I verify the day "2" summary weather condition is same as the first three hour data
I verify the day "2" summary wind speed and direction is same as the first three hour data
I verify the day "2" maximum and minimum temperature summary is displayed correctly
I verify the day "2" rainfall summary is the aggregate three hour data
I click on day "2"
The three hourly forecast is "Not Displayed" for day "2"
I click on day "3"
The three hourly forecast is "Displayed" for day "3"
I verify the day "3" summary weather condition is same as the first three hour data
I verify the day "3" summary wind speed and direction is same as the first three hour data
I verify the day "3" maximum and minimum temperature summary is displayed correctly
I verify the day "3" rainfall summary is the aggregate three hour data
I click on day "3"
The three hourly forecast is "Not Displayed" for day "3"
I click on day "4"
The three hourly forecast is "Displayed" for day "4"
I verify the day "4" summary weather condition is same as the first three hour data
I verify the day "4" summary wind speed and direction is same as the first three hour data
I verify the day "4" maximum and minimum temperature summary is displayed correctly
I verify the day "4" rainfall summary is the aggregate three hour data
I click on day "4"
The three hourly forecast is "Not Displayed" for day "4"
I click on day "5"
The three hourly forecast is "Displayed" for day "5"
I verify the day "5" summary weather condition is same as the first three hour data
I verify the day "5" summary wind speed and direction is same as the first three hour data
I verify the day "5" maximum and minimum temperature summary is displayed correctly
I verify the day "5" rainfall summary is the aggregate three hour data
I click on day "5"
The three hourly forecast is "Not Displayed" for day "5"
The Weather Forecast application is launched
